column6: Shang-Chi, master of kung-fu, is a hero - but his father is pure evil! And when his dear daddy launches a major assault on the Knights, one member calls it quits! But who leaves: Daredevil, Moon Knight, Luke Cage...or Shang-Chi himself? Meanwhile, there's something rotten at the heart of S.H.I.E.L.D. - and Dagger and Black Widow are determined to find out what it is!
